# shadowImage

**Instance Property**

The shadow image to be used for the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shadowImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which corresponds to the default shadow image. When non-`nil`, this property represents a custom shadow image to show instead of the default. To show a custom shadow image, you must also set a custom background image with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/setBackgroundImage(_:for:)] method. If the default background image is used, then the default shadow image is used regardless of the value of this property.
